00074 typedef enum rn_message_type_tag rn_message_type;
00075 
00076         /*
00077          * type -- one of UPSTREAM or DOWNSTREAM, so that a layer may know
00078          *         how to handle this message.
00079          * size -- the hypothetically size of the packet, for queueing stats
00080          * dsize -- the size of the data portion of this message.. semantically
00081          *         equivalent to passing the size of the buffer in a write call
00082          * data -- the message passed to a layer.. this is the actual message
00083          */
